Author: Audo#5667
Content: yeah I think a dedicated page for investors/community would be good, but that's not in the scope of this website update. Instead we we are planning to rely on a welcome email / email journey.

Author: Audo#5667
Content: and people are focusing on developer documentation, and after we have that we can market/highlight it. The CC / 2.0 smart contract tech is in development/testing at the moment.

Author: KomodoWorld#8282
Content: So a page for dapps will come later, after tech, docs and wp are ready, ok üëç

Author: Audo#5667
Content: yeah, it's going to take some time before we can really push with the crypto conditions (CC) asset tech stuff marketing. We haven't even mentioned it yet on our blog üòÉ

Author: Audo#5667
Content: but that's in plans, yes, the developer community is our main audience

Author: KomodoWorld#8282
Content: seems fine, developers and businesses are the main targets

Author: KomodoWorld#8282
Content: 2019 will be very exciting, most pieces will come together

Author: KomodoWorld#8282
Content: about the website wireframe, what about adding links to technical docs/github at step 4? Next to Chainzilla and Chainmakers. Or in a separate step. Like sending the message that expert developers can do it themselves, not necessarily hire a service provider

Author: KomodoWorld#8282
Content: This would avoid giving an impression of centralization

Author: Audo#5667
Content: thats very true, we need to provide links to our documentation

Author: Audo#5667
Content: and perhaps indeed say that anyone can do it

Author: KomodoWorld#8282
Content: yes that is important in order not to give a wrong impression

Author: Regnar#6164
Content: well value is subjective of course, and the metrics used to measure it can be "beaten" or manipulated to mean or show different things. But that site does offer some interesting insights and a cool way to determine a networks value beyond a price. I think combining that with blocktivity info is a pretty strong indicator of network value, at least as a value measurement of capacity.
